venue.name: Intrigue Caf√© at The Boston Harbor Hotel

item.description:
** UPDATE***

The Taj Hotel was booked for this weekend, so we will be going to the The Intrigue Cafe at the Boston Harbor Hotel instead. We will still plan on meeting at 2:00 in the lobby. You can find directions here and read more about their tea here. I apologize for the confusion!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Do you like dressing up, sipping tea, eating overpriced finger sandwiches, and fancy cakes?

If so join us on Saturday October 24th for afternoon tea at the Taj Hotel in downtown Boston.

The Taj has an elegant decor and is considered the best tea room in Boston.
The standard tea set is $30.00, but tea and cocktails are available a la carte. (see link below for menu)

I will make the reservation on Wednesday October 21st, so please RSVP before then. Once the reservation is set I will email everyone to confirm.



http://www.tajhotels....
item.name: Afternoon Tea Meetup
